com.android.uiautomator.common.helpers

Class DatePickerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.uiautomator.common.helpers.DatePickerHelper

  • public class DatePickerHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Use this helper anywhere there is a date picker to manage. This helper will set date specified in a Calendar object.
